question:
You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Austalia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year.
Write a letter to the couple. In your letter
* explain why think you would be suitable for the job
* say what else you could do for the family
* give your reasons for wanting the job
text: I am writing this letter to show my keen interest in the advert about the requirement for a tutor to teach my native language to your heir.

I was looking for this kind of job for a very long period as I am in great need of work due to my family's financial issues. So, I am in dire need of a permanent vacancy through which I can easily handle my household tasks.

There are enormous factors which made me suitable for this post yet among them one of the foremost is my teaching experience of more than 10 years. Moreover, My class is not old-school strict nor is the teacher-centred which benefits children to gain more without hesitation and any kind of trouble.
Furthermore, I can also provide a facility to teach your offspring from your home  through virtual mode in case of any requirement.
Therefore, Due to the aforesaid qualities, I find myself in a good position for getting a chance to teach your children. Hope to get a positive reply from your side.
